Reviews.Content: arrived late afternoon overnight stay told allocated double single bed instead double booked told single struggled 4 flights stairs luggage appeared decorated decades scuff marks walls stairs dirty paintwork carpets arrived front building initially getting temperamental lock inside double bed sideways window wardrobe doors wall bottom bed person sleeping window bed climb bases beds dirty material hanging bathroom size consisted circular shower tray mouldy curtain 2 inches short hanging fixing broken toilet seat loose fixings broken water basin taps intermittent dinner taxi ride hotel embarassed western hotel doors destination following earlier sympathetic looks received original taxi driver arrived hotel actually slept top bed wasnt confident cleanliness breakfast didnt risk cant comment morning escaped soon return

Reviews.Title: “Nowhere near as bad as the reviews”
Reviews.Author: looprevil
Reviews.Content: reading reviews dreading arriving hotel weekend impressions outside looked neat tidy receptionist friendly directions catch tour bus hold double single bed walk downside couldnt watch tv single bed beds comfortable beds day bin emptied towels replaced clean dry ones tea coffee plentiful whitener instead milk bathroom smallish shower dry yourself afterwards door lock bit getting remembering leave key reception time continental breakfast consisted toast cereal im continent eat worry wetherspoons 5 minutes road towards victoria station

Reviews.Title: “Don't stay here ... Bugs walking across the Dining Room Tables!!!!”
Reviews.Author: dduha987
Reviews.Content: disgusting ive stayed tiny expected london standards remotely clean bed covering stained ensuite toilet extended shower step porta john breakfast bugs crawling table seeing complained refund unused days wouldnt refund money shut appalling stay

Reviews.Title: “cheap and ok”
Reviews.Author: John-Ingrid
Reviews.Content: london midweek break staying 1 night booked blair victoria near coach station easy twin 1 double 1 single clean ish bathroom somthing else sink boxed shower person cant raise arms shave brush teeth breakfast cramped staff considering plenty eat remember pay pay cheap cheap
